title: (x) Blocky black display face w/ small notched cut-outs - Ruda type {Jazzy B}
content:
i’m looking for the font used in the design below, thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [576611201272262.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020830/http:/typophile.com/files/576611201272262.jpg) | 188.76 KB |

 [‹ (x) Lined Bauhaus-style sans on Glam Rock album cover- Pump Triline {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020830/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42717 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Tech sans on "De Wereld in Antwerpen" book cover - FF DIN {Conor} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020830/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42744 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dublave

comments.content:
Custom made, called Ruda Type.

He explains it here,  
 [http://flickr.com/photos/en\_remolinos/2176602951/in/pool-dsignitive-xplo...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020830/http:/flickr.com/photos/en_remolinos/2176602951/in/pool-dsignitive-xplosion "http://flickr.com/photos/en\_remolinos/2176602951/in/pool-dsignitive-xplosion")
whoops, i failed to look in the most obvious place! thanks!
You might like [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020830/http:/www.neutura.org/Deuce.html) from Neutura as an alternative.
